item.text: So as your fellow elder and a witness of Christ’s sufferings and as one who shares in the glory that will be revealed, I urge the elders among you:

<st data-num="4165">Give a shepherd’s care</st> to<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2316" class="">God’s</st> <st data-num="4168" class="">flock</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1983">exercising oversight</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3366" class="">not</st> <st data-num="317">merely as a duty</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1596" class="">willingly</st> <st data-num="2596">under</st> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> direction,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="3366" class="">not</st> for <st data-num="147">shameful profit</st> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="4290" class="">eagerly</st>.

<st data-num="3366" class="">And</st> do <st data-num="3366" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2634" class="">lord</st> it <st data-num="2634" class="">over</st><n id="1" /> those <st data-num="2819" class="">entrusted</st> to you,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">be</st> <st data-num="5179" class="">examples</st> to the <st data-num="4168" class="">flock</st>.
Then when the Chief Shepherd appears, you will receive the crown of glory that never fades away.
In the same way, you who are younger, be subject to the elders. And all of you, clothe yourselves with humility toward one another because God opposes the proud but gives grace to the humble.

<st data-num="3767">And</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> will <st data-num="5312" class="">exalt</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2540">due time</st>,<n id="1" /> if <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="5013" class="">humble</st> yourselves <st data-num="5259" class="">under</st> his <st data-num="2900" class="">mighty</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st><n id="2" />

by <st data-num="1977">casting</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3308" class="">cares</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="3199" class="">cares</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.
Be sober and alert. Your enemy the devil, like a roaring lion, is on the prowl looking for someone to devour.

<st data-num="436" class="">Resist</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">him</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4731" class="">strong</st> in your <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>, because you <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st><n id="2" /> that <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="81" class="">brothers and sisters</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">throughout</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st><n id="4" /> are <st data-num="2005" class="">enduring</st><n id="5" /> the <st data-num="846">same kinds</st> of <st data-num="3804" class="">suffering</st>.<n id="6" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st>, after <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> have <st data-num="3958" class="">suffered</st> for a <st data-num="3641">little while</st>, the <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> of <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> who <st data-num="2564" class="">called</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="846" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="2675" class="">restore</st>, <st data-num="4741" class="">confirm</st>, <st data-num="4599" class="">strengthen</st>, and <st data-num="2311">establish</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.<n id="2" />
To him belongs the power forever. Amen.
Through Silvanus, whom I know to be a faithful brother, I have written to you briefly, in order to encourage you and testify that this is the true grace of God. Stand fast in it.

<st data-num="3588">The church</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="897" class="">Babylon</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4899" class="">chosen together with</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="782" class="">greets</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> so does <st data-num="3138" class="">Mark</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st>.
Greet one another with a loving kiss. Peace to all of you who are in Christ.
